Create a competition between local architects to design the most innovative and sustainable high-rise building.
Organize a hackathon for developers to create a smart building management system that reduces energy consumption and improves the living experience of tenants.
Host an art exhibition in the lobby of the high-rise building, featuring works by local artists inspired by the cityscape and the building itself.

Launch a campaign encouraging residents to participate in community service projects, such as planting trees or cleaning up nearby parks, in exchange for discounts on rent or amenities in the high-rise building.

Partner with local universities to offer educational programs and workshops on sustainable building practices and green technologies for students interested in pursuing careers in architecture or construction.
